author: smuzaffar
body:
This should fix the failing unit test. The data file was not read using FileInPath. This PR proposes to use pfnInPath to search the DDLSchema.xsd file.

@qliphy , this should fix the https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34087#issuecomment-860137766 issue
title: use pfnInPath to find the DDLSchema.xsd
